results.title: Bolts Ditch Access and Use Act
results.short_title: Bolts Ditch Access and Use Act
results.committees: Senate Energy and Natural Resources Committee
results.latest_major_action: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 66.
results.summary: (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary has been expanded because action occurred on the measure.) Bolts Ditch Access and Use Act (Sec. 2) This bill directs the Department of Agriculture to permit by special use authorization nonmotorized access and use of the Bolts Ditch headgate and the Bolts Ditch within the Holy Cross Wilderness in Colorado for the diversion of water and use, maintenance, and repair of the ditch and headgate by the town of Minturn, Colorado.
results.summary_short: (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary has been expanded because action occurred on the measure.) Bolts Ditch Access and Use Act (Sec. 2) This bill directs the Department of Agriculture to permit by special use authorization nonmotorized access and use of the Bolts Ditch headgate and the Bolts Ditch within the Holy Cross Wilderness in Colorado for the diversion of water and use, maintenance, and repair of the ditch and headgate by the town of Minturn, Colorado.

actions.description: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 66.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported by Senator Murkowski without amendment. With written report No. 115-53.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
